Params: I checked it again in case there was a mistake...
Data shows that most of the functions in the Golden Vortex have stopped running.
Someone's helping us... Is it Kamui?
(Replaces the damaged parts on his gun) Maybe.
Which means Nat has lost the power for the comms interference modules.
I'm with the Joint Task Force, preparing to back you up. We'll be there to rescue you in a minute!
The Science Council and I have looked into the report on the Golden Vortex.
The weather engine they are using is made with parts of a Central Purification Filter from the Post-Pandemic Age.
Meaning that a large amount of Punishing Virus is currently being drawn from the air.
Is that so? Then we should have received warnings the moment we entered the Golden Vortex...
...Unless the gold dust has suppressed the virus.
This antigen can't completely remove the virus. It won't be long before there's a massive outbreak here.
For your safety, the Joint Task Force must retreat now.
When the outbreak happens, Nat's guards... will mostly likely turn into enhanced Corrupted.
Liv, you must get out of here.
(Wipes the shattered metal off her blade) ...
I understand that there are other teams within the Golden Vortex?
That's right, President. Karenina, Bianca, and Kamui are still here...
I don't like the idea of leaving the commandant in danger...
But I hate the idea of leaving my soldiers behind even more.
I'll come up with a plan of retreat!
